metadata.Title: CVE-2013-7298 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
query_params.cpp in cxxtools before 2.2.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite recursion and crash) via an HTTP query that contains %% (double percent) characters.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7298` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcxxtools9 - 2.2.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cxxtools package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.1-1').
